docs: Create a new contract.
name: new

docs: Event emitted a Media event is emitted
events.name: MediaEvent

docs: CreateMedia creates a new Media and mints the NFT token for it.
Params:
media_name: Name of the Media.
media_symbol:  Symbol of the Media.
media_type: Type of the Media.
view_conditions: View info of the media.
royalty: Royalties that goes to the creators.
collabs: Collaborators of the media + the allocation
name: create_media

docs: ShareMedia is called when a media is being shared
ParentId  - Id of last vertex of the sharing chain
MediaSymbol	-	Symbol of the Media
Address -	Address sharing the media
name: share_media

docs: Buy Media
media_symbol:  Symbol of the Media.
address: Address of the buyer of the Media.
name: buy_media

docs: Returns a Media.
Params:
media_symbol: id of the Media
name: get_media

docs: OpenMedia is called when a media is being viewed
Address		string	Address aiming to consume the media
MediaSymbol	string	Symbol of the Media
SharingId	string	If this is consumed consumed by a sharing
name: open_media

docs: CloseMediaRequest - request entity used when calling CloseMedia
name: close_media

docs: TipMedia is called when a media is being viewed
MediaSymbol	string	Symbol of the Media
Address		string	Address of the person which want to give a tip
Amount		string	Amount of the token of the tip
TokenAddress	string	Address of the token of the tip
name: tip_media
